A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It was a good movie\, but it didn't answer questions fans had. It didn't go the direction that many felt it should.

I was over all a little disappointed in it\, however as a movie\, I think it was good. 

Honestly though\, life never turns out how you expect\, so why would StarWars? I mean it was different\, it didn't follow the same old story. It wasn't a re-telling\, it was something different. 

I was disappointed\, but not mad. I am more intrigued as to what they could possibly do with it now.

Yes\, I want to watch it again.
